data.text: So, what's up?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>So, what's up?

data.text:
...I heard rumors that you've been turning down many scouts 
on the spot. I've already given you several warnings, but you still 
haven't changed.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>...I heard rumors that you've been turning down many scouts 
<story>on the spot. I've already given you several warnings, but you still 
<story>haven't changed.

data.text:
.... 
Rudolf is saying ome boring thing today.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>.... 
<story>Rudolf is saying ome boring thing today.

data.text:
I know thi skind of advice is extremely annoying for you, 
but I've been in a similar position myself.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I know thi skind of advice is extremely annoying for you, 
<story>but I've been in a similar position myself.

data.text:
If you don't have a trainer, you can't debut. 
...If you continue, you may be considered a dropout and 
be expelled.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>If you don't have a trainer, you can't debut. 
<story>...If you continue, you may be considered a dropout and 
<story>be expelled.

data.text:
...The sight of a top-class Umamusume like you standing still is 
troubling to me personally. At the very least, I want to know 
the reason.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>...The sight of a top-class Umamusume like you standing still is 
<story>troubling to me personally. At the very least, I want to know 
<story>the reason.

data.text: The reason, huh...
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>The reason, huh...

data.text:
...It's not that I don't want to make it. 
I just don't have anyone who really gets it.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...It's not that I don't want to make it. 
<story>I just don't have anyone who really gets it.

data.text:
I just can't understand the value of glory. 
Not the "G1 victories" nor the legend of the "Classic Triple Crown".
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I just can't understand the value of glory. 
<story>Not the "G1 victories" nor the legend of the "Classic Triple Crown".

data.text:
I can't grant what they wish for. 
I can't walk with them.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I can't grant what they wish for. 
<story>I can't walk with them.

data.text:
But that being said, I'm not comfortable with forcing them 
to go along with it. It's a vicious cycle.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>But that being said, I'm not comfortable with forcing them 
<story>to go along with it. It's a vicious cycle.

data.text: ...still think I'm stubborn?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...still think I'm stubborn?

data.text: No, I thought that was typical of you.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed: <story>No, I thought that was typical of you.

data.text:
...Why don't you try changing your perspective for once, C.B.? 
Values... they don't need to match as much as you think.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>...Why don't you try changing your perspective for once, C.B.? 
<story>Values... they don't need to match as much as you think.

data.text:
I think that a trainer has something that can't come 
from the Umamusume itself.
data.name: Symboli Rudolf
data.processed:
<story>I think that a trainer has something that can't come 
<story>from the Umamusume itself.

data.text: Hah, hah, hah...
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Hah, hah, hah...

data.text:
(...... 
.......Why can't I enter the race by myself?)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>(...... 
<story>.......Why can't I enter the race by myself?)

data.text: (I've never been able to fit in with the crowd.)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>(I've never been able to fit in with the crowd.)

data.text:
(The ground looked shiny even in the heavy rain. 
It was so much fun, so much fun that I was so absorbed in 
running around, but then I was scolded.)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>(The ground looked shiny even in the heavy rain. 
<story>It was so much fun, so much fun that I was so absorbed in 
<story>running around, but then I was scolded.)

data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>(I was scolded for wearing a jersey to school because it was 
<story>too tight, and I was scolded when I skipped class and went 
<story>for a walk because the blue sky felt good.)

data.text: ...Hey, why can't you listen to what the teacher says?
data.name: School Teacher
data.processed: <story>...Hey, why can't you listen to what the teacher says?

data.text:
(Even if I'm told to turn right, I can't do it if I can't accept it. 
The values that are normal for me were easy to create enemies.)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>(Even if I'm told to turn right, I can't do it if I can't accept it. 
<story>The values that are normal for me were easy to create enemies.)

data.text: (One day, I was skipping school and didn't know what to do――)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>(One day, I was skipping school and didn't know what to do――)

data.text:
...Huh? You mean, because you don't have enough members? 
I've never raced before... Is that okay?
data.name: Young C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...Huh? You mean, because you don't have enough members? 
<story>I've never raced before... Is that okay?

data.text:
Wow, the gate is quite narrow! 
So, once this opens, it's off to the start――
data.name: Young C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Wow, the gate is quite narrow! 
<story>So, once this opens, it's off to the start――

data.name: Young C.B.
data.processed: <story>Ha...――

data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>――....ha!

data.text:
(I always remember it vividly. The moment the narrow gate 
opened that day, the lush turf welcomed me with all its might.)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>(I always remember it vividly. The moment the narrow gate 
<story>opened that day, the lush turf welcomed me with all its might.)

data.text: (I thought I had found the freest place in the world.)
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>(I thought I had found the freest place in the world.)

data.text: Hah, hah... ahhーーー...
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Hah, hah... ahhーーー...

data.text:
...So, I joined a club team right after that. 
I was really excited. ...But in the end, it didn't work out.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...So, I joined a club team right after that. 
<story>I was really excited. ...But in the end, it didn't work out.

data.text:
...Tracen Academy, where you can compete in the highest level 
races. I thought that here I would find a way to run freely...
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...Tracen Academy, where you can compete in the highest level 
<story>races. I thought that here I would find a way to run freely...

data.text:
....... 
...Phewー...cough.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>....... 
<story>...Phewー...cough.

data.text: ...I wonder how everyone can run for something.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...I wonder how everyone can run for something.

data.text:
After shopping in town, it had gotten quite late, 
so I was hurrying back home when――
data.processed:
<story>After shopping in town, it had gotten quite late, 
<story>so I was hurrying back home when――

data.text: Hmmmー...
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Hmmmー...
